services.description: A list of services, each with its own log address and rules.

service_name.description: The name of the service that generates the log. This is used to identify which service the log is related to (e.g., 'nginx', 'dpvs', etc.).

log_address.description: The file path where the log is stored. It could be an absolute or relative path to the log file (e.g., '/var/log/nginx/access.log').

rules.description: A set of rules used to parse the log file. Each rule is identified by a key and its associated value defines the pattern or condition that the log entry should match.

additionalProperties.description: The rule associated with the log entry. The value could be a regex pattern or a specific condition to match log entries (e.g., matching specific HTTP request types, error levels, or IP addresses).
